price: Basi ilikuwaje adhabu yangu na maonyo yangu!
footnotes: Basi vipi ilikuwa adhabu yangu na onyo langu kwa hao wakhalifu walio kwenda kinyume na amri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
